text: I prefer cjson since it's much faster: http://www.vazor.com/cjson.html
I wrote the cjson 1.0.6 patch and my advice is don't use cjson -- there are other problems with cjson in how it handles unicode etc.
I don't think the speed of cjson is worth dealing with the bugs -- encoding/decoding json is usually a very small bit of the time needed to process a typical web request...
json in python 2.6+ is basically simplejson brought into the standard library I believe...
